Constructor Detail

OpenCVHandler

public OpenCVHandler(boolean show)
Standard constructor. Creates all the needed elements for the detection.

Parameters:
show - true: only right hand is calculated, and output is shown; false: both hand data is calculated, no output
Method Detail

createHandImage

public com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage createHandImage(org.OpenNI.Point3D hand,
                                                                      int depth,
                                                                      int xOffset,
                                                                      int yOffset)
Creates a image of the hand at the specified position with specified depth and offset.

Parameters:
hand - real world position of the hand
depth - depth at the current hand
xOffset - offset in x direction
yOffset - offset in y direction
Returns:
B/W image of the hand

Detect the number of fingers and updates the hand element.

Parameters:
image - hand image to be checked
hand - hand to be updated
